name: The Dawning of Big Chungus
description:
In this game, you will fight as soldier Aldo Raine on a small island near Hawaii against many Big Chungi. The Chungus Boss deployed many minions from his spacecraft, and you must fight to save the earth. REMEMBER: This game is only in alpha, and each donation helps make this game better with more updates! 

paypal.me/he1senberf
